text: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti
edit: Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrenti

translations.transtext: The four foundations of mindfulness, [when] having been cultivated and practiced frequently, fulfill the seven factors of enlightenment.
